titleStmt.title: In the matter of the application of Mary E. Teller for a Writ of Habeas Corpus. Testimony of E. R. Bird

publicationStmt.authority: Bring Me the Body: A Digital & Print History of Marginalized Habeas Corpus Petitioners in the North American West, 1804-1912

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: In the matter of the application of Mary E. Teller for a Writ of Habeas Corpus. Testimony of E. R. Bird
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.
Multiple case files included with habeas petition

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: Yesterday morning I went in company with Mr Perkins to Mr Frank Tellers house and saw him lying between his house and gate dead there was a doubled barrell shot gun lying about two feet from him cocked and capped I also saw a short piece of board near him with blood on it
